title: The liquidity wave carrying stocks will continue even after the Powell Pivot, this analyst argues. Here's why.
text:
U.S. economy added 534,000 private-sector jobs in November, ADP says

Private payrolls rose by 534,000 in November, according to the ADP National Employment Report released Wednesday. See full story.

Will global air travel be grounded for three months? That's what oil traders have priced in, says Goldman Sachs

Leading investment bank says oil has priced in "not a single plane flying around the world for three months." See full story.

FDA advisers recommend Merck's COVID-19 pill in close vote

The advisory committee decided by a narrow margin that the benefits of Merck's experimental antiviral COVID-19 pill outweigh its risks. See full story.

Jack Dorsey is â€˜all in' on Square now, and this analyst thinks it improves outlook for stock

Square Inc. Chief Executive Jack Dorsey will have more time to focus on the payments company now that he's stepping down from the CEO post at Twitter Inc., and that has one analyst feeling better about Square's stock. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Capital gains aren't the only factor to consider in anticipating the tax burden of an inherited home. See full story.
